title: Promo Paywall with Valid code
custom_preconds:
Given the user has an iPhone with MLB app installed 
AND user has a valid code to redeem the offer
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the promo via deeplink with valid code
custom_expected: THEN the user will be presented with a T-Mobile branded paywall with a “Redeem Now” button

title: Offer Details
custom_preconds: Given the user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the T-Mobile paywall that is opened via a valid deep link
custom_expected:
THEN the paywall should display
AND the "See full details" link will be available
AND will go to the correct location when tapped

title: Redeem Now
custom_preconds: Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps:
WHEN user has navigated to T-Mobile paywall that is opened via deep link with a valid code
AND user taps on Redeem Now on Paywall
custom_expected:
THEN the user will go through the standard Apple in-app purchase flow
and then will be displayed a "Success!" message that their 2020 subscription is now active

title: Entitled User - Connect Purchase Screen
custom_preconds: Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps:
WHEN user has tapped on Redeem Now on Paywall 
and has successfully redeemed
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted with a Connect Purchase screen to either Skip or Connect their purchase via linking

title: Entitled User - Anonymous
custom_preconds: Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps:
WHEN user has tapped on Redeem Now on Paywall 
and has successfully redeemed
and is prompted with the Connect Purchase screen
and taps "Skip"
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be in the app as an anonymous, entitled user
and the user will be able to view MLB.TV feeds

title: Entitled User - Linking to MLB Account
custom_preconds: Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps:
WHEN user has tapped on Redeem Now on Paywall 
and has successfully redeemed
and is prompted with the Connect Purchase screen
and taps "Connect"
custom_expected: THEN the user will be prompted to either login with an existing MLB account or register a new MLB account

title: Entitled User - Successful Linking to Existing MLB Account
custom_preconds: Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps:
WHEN user has tapped on Redeem Now on Paywall 
and has successfully redeemed
and is prompted with the Connect Purchase screen
and taps "Connect"
and logs in with an existing MLB account
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be in the app as a logged-in, entitled user
and the user will be able to view MLB.TV feeds

title: Entitled User - Successful Linking to Newly Registered MLB Account
custom_preconds: Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps:
WHEN user has tapped on Redeem Now on Paywall 
and has successfully redeemed
and is prompted with the Connect Purchase screen
and taps "Connect"
and registers a new MLB account
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be in the app as a logged-in, entitled user
and the user will be able to view MLB.TV feeds

title: Linking to MLB Account via Settings
custom_preconds:
Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
and has successfully redeemed the T-Mobile promotion
and has opted to Skip the Connect Purchase screen
custom_steps:
When the user is in the app
and logs in with an MLB via app Settings
custom_expected:
Then the T-Mobile entitlement will be linked to the MLB account
and the user will be able to port the subscription to other device

title: Restoring Purchase
custom_preconds:
Given user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
and has successfully redeemed the T-Mobile promotion
(but has not linked the subscription to an MLB.com account)
custom_steps:
When the user uninstalls and then reinstalls the app
and taps the "Restore" link from the paywall
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to restore their T-Mobile subscription 
and can use their entitlements in the app

title: Promo offer with invalid code
custom_preconds: Given the user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps: When the user has a deep link with an invalid code
custom_expected: THEN the user is displayed a message "Sorry, something went wrong."

title: Promo offer with expired code
custom_preconds: Given the user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps: When the user has a deep link with an expired code
custom_expected: THEN the user will be displayed a message "This code is no longer valid."

title: Promo offer with already redeemed code
custom_preconds: Given the user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps: When the user has a deep link with a code that has already been redeemed
custom_expected: THEN the user will be displayed a message "Our records indicate this code was already redeemed."

title: Promo Paywall
custom_preconds: Given the user has an iPhone with MLB app installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the T-Mobile paywall that is opened via deep link
custom_expected:
THEN the paywall should display 
AND have overridable images, text and colors

title: Paywall - Spanish Language
custom_preconds:
Given the user has a device with MLB app installed 
AND user's device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the T-Mobile paywall that is opened via deep link
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be displayed the Paywall promo offer 
AND check that offer copy is localized in Spanish

title: In app purchases disabled error
custom_preconds:
- The user has turned off the ability to make in app purchases in:
 Settings -> Screen Time -> Content & Privacy Restrictions
custom_steps:
- Disable the ability to make in app purchases on the device
- Open the T-Mobile paywall via deep link with a valid code
- Tap "Redeem Now"
custom_expected:
User should see an error with the title: 
"Settings Mismatch"
And the description:
"In order to redeem this offer, your device must be able to make app store purchases. Please check your Screen Time Settings and ensure app store purchases are enabled."

title: Redemption Page Updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched the T Mobile Redemption page from a universal link
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the redemption page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ All copy is updated to the new campaign year
+ The T Mobile/MLB.tv lockup logo is displayed under the Close button
+ "get free [MLB.tv] with T-Mobile" copy is displayed
+ "Thanks to Magenta Status, just for being a customer." copy is displayed
+ activate now button (black and white)
+ See full details link available
+ "Blackout and other restrictions apply." "TM/C 2025 MLB" copy displayed at footer.

title: Success/Failure Page Updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has navigated through the redemption flow for T Mobile / MLB.tv
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the redemption successful/failure page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The T-Mobile/MLB.tv lockup logo will be displayed in the center of the page
+ "Score!" copy is displayed
+ "Your 2025 subscription is now active, thanks to Magenta Status!" is displayed
+ Black and white "watch now" button is available.
+ "Blackout and other subscriptions apply. TM/C 2025 MLB" copy is displayed
